issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
Per https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HDFS-Build/15646/testReport/, we had the following failure. Local rerun is successful.
Error Details: 
{panel}
org.apache.hadoop.ipc.RemoteException(java.lang.AssertionError): bad state: CLOSED

comments.body: This may be a HA bug.  It seems that the call failed due to editlog closed during failover.
